ETYMOLOGY: Compound of 'part' and 'time', referencing a portion of the standard working duration.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Involving or working only a fraction of the customary or standard number of hours in a working week or academic period.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 兼职的；非全日制的；工作或学习时间少于标准时长的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She decided to take a part-time course while raising her children.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她决定在抚养孩子的同时参加一个非全日制课程。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: On a basis of less than the standard working or academic period.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 以兼职的方式；非全日制地。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He currently works part-time at the library to earn extra money.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他目前在图书馆做兼职以赚取额外的钱。
